title: Looking for Hugo Steiner-Prag quote
content:
Hello,

a few years ago I read (heard? can't remember) that [Hugo Steiner-Prag](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821061023/http:/findingaids.cjh.org/?fnm=HugoSteinerPrag&pnm=LBI#a2) referred to the spine of the book as its face, since it's the part that you look at when it's placed on a shelf. _Or something to that effect_.  
Now that I want to use it properly, I can't seem to find it.

Do the words ring any bell, anyone?

Cheers,

ƒ
author: fredo
